name: Feltipern Trevagg's Stun Rifle
Lore: 'Assault rifle modified by Feltipern. Used by the Gotal bounty hunter before he became a tax collector. Occasionally brought along to ''ease'' Feltipern''s collection duties.',
Text: 'Deploy on Feltipern Trevagg or use 2 Force to deploy on your other bounty hunter. May target a character using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Add 2 if target is the target of any bounty. Target may be captured if total destiny > defense value.',
